New Records: Yuki Kawamura became the fourth Japanese born player to score in an NBA game.
Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura tallied his first NBA points at the free throw line.
Ja Morant had a great reaction to Kawamura's first NBA points.
The Memphis Grizzlies picked up a win over the Los Angeles Lakers.
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant has been very supportive of Kawamura since they became teammates, and fans have loved the duo.
This was a special night for Kawamura, and a big game for the Grizzlies.
